message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
Let's be practical, Alice. Time is money. My offer gets us to a resolution quickly.
Let's try to be more fair this time, Bob. I'm willing to go up to 60 for you, but I need to get a better deal than your previous offer.
Okay Alice, let's stop wasting time.  50/50 is the most logical split.
